meta.title: Rethink Lead Generation: Advanced Strategies to Generate More Leads for Your Business
meta.author: Tom Shapiro

parts.title: Rethinking Lead Generation with Creativity
parts.body: Discover how Tom Shapiro encourages marketers to rethink lead generation strategies with creativity and lateral thinking. Through insights such as SAP's innovative content approach and trailblazing examples from Larry Kim and Salesforce, readers learn to challenge norms and go beyond best practices to drive substantial growth. Essentially, this book empowers businesses to achieve remarkable results by prioritizing creative approaches instead of traditional methods.

parts.title: Free Offers Boost SEO and Leads
parts.body: Understanding Page Load Testing can be crucial for businesses. Pingdom offers a free tool for you to test web page load times from different global server locations. Why free? It's SEO strategy genius: 34,000 websites link back to Pingdom. Similarly, Tableau exploded in traffic using a free version of their software, which attracted many non-expert users. This free strategy was an entry point for future upgrades to paid products. Nearly 100,000 websites gave them 9 million links, highlighting how free tools can lead to SEO benefits.

parts.title: Effective VoC Collection with Contextual Surveys
parts.body: Stratabeat generates valuable VoC (Voice of Customer) by using contextual surveys on relevant blog post topics like SEO or behavioral intelligence. This method ensures high-quality audience feedback and insights into industry challenges. Qualitative responses, especially the final questions, offer unique insights competitors may not have. Conducting annual surveys establishes authority in industries, as ongoing reports maintain audience interest and media attention. They prove vital in capturing leads, as seen with companies like Provenir and platforms like Drift that effectively use surveys and chatbots to qualify leads and guide conversations.

parts.title: Harnessing Personalization on Your Website for Better Engagement
parts.body:
Personalization Strategies

Personalizing your website can massively boost lead generation by tailoring experiences to visitor segments. Using tools such as marketing automation and IP detection software, you can customize messaging, imagery, and calls-to-action (CTAs) based on the visitor's geolocation or expressed interests. For instance, you can refine pages in your account-based marketing (ABM) campaigns to ensure they meet the specific needs of your target companies. Tools like interactive wizards or surveys can further customize experiences by capturing visitor details, enhancing segmentation and personalization.

Efficient Personalization Techniques

Even without advanced tools, basic personalization in your website—targeting different industries or job roles—can elevate user experience and conversion rates. This results in a more satisfying engagement, leading to an increase in on-site time and better interaction. It not only forms a personal connection with visitors but can significantly boost site performance. Continual refinement and A/B testing of personalized elements will continuously enhance outcomes and optimize user journeys.

parts.title: Using Creativity in Content Marketing
parts.body: For effective content marketing, aim to create work that captures your audience's attention. Think creatively and use content as a way to build relationships rather than solely for gaining search visibility and traffic. Use original, captivating campaigns like Wistia's "Video Marketing Week" to draw in audience engagement. This campaign shows that creating a unique event or experience can be a powerful strategy to attract and retain audience interest, ultimately generating leads and providing valuable educational content.

parts.title: Create Bigger Impact with Content & Master Google E-A-T
parts.body: Create Bigger Impact with Content Content helps potential customers decide to buy from you. Use specific tools like case studies and ROI calculators. Even if search volume is low, it moves buyers closer to purchasing. General content doesn't work well at the bottom of the funnel. Think precision and specificity. For web design services, for instance, narrow down to specific topics like "increase the conversion rates of a software website." Master Google E-A-T for Success No matter where your content fits (top, middle, or bottom), consider Google E-A-T (Expertise, Authoritativeness, Trustworthiness). Many marketers don't know this, which needs to change. It's vital for SEO and protects your content from getting disqualified by Google. Enhance your content with proof of expertise. Especially critical for health or wealth subjects, known as YMYL (Your Money Your Life) topics.

parts.title: ABM Success Strategies
parts.body: ABM is a powerful strategy for growing both new and existing accounts. For example, Pegasystems successfully expanded JPMorgan Chase by using ABM techniques like internal webinars and account-specific LinkedIn groups. They even had JPMorgan employees promote Pegasystems solutions, boosting conversion rates and ROI by leveraging personal endorsements within the company. ABM helps understand accounts holistically, offering scalable opportunities for deep engagement.
